item.title: End BC-3A West at BC-3
item.description: End BC-3A West at BC-3. Use BC-3 West for Castlegar, Grand Forks, and Trail.

item.title: BC-3A West approaching BC-3
item.description: BC-3A West approaching BC-3. Use right lane for BC-3 West/Castlegar. Use left lane for BC-3 East/Weigh Station/Salmo.

item.title: BC-6 South at BC-3A Junction
item.description: BC-6 South at BC-3A. Turn right for BC-3A west to Castlegar and Trail; turn left for BC-3A east and BC-6 south to Nelson. BC-6 south joins BC-3A east to Nelson.

item.title: End BC-3A West at BC-3
item.description: End BC-3A West at BC-3. Use BC-3 West for Castlegar, Grand Forks, and Trail.

item.title: BC-3A West approaching BC-3
item.description: BC-3A West approaching BC-3. Use right lane for BC-3 West/Castlegar. Use left lane for BC-3 East/Weigh Station/Salmo.

item.title: BC-3A West - Robson Interchange
item.description: BC-3A West at Castlegar City Centre/Robson interchange.

item.title: BC-3A East at BC-6
item.description: BC-3A East at BC-6. BC-6 south joins BC-3A east to Nelson.

item.title: BC-3A West/BC-6 North Split
item.description: BC-3A West/BC-6 North split in South Slocan. Turn right for BC-6 north to Slocan, New Denver, and Nakusp.

item.title: BC-3A West at BC-6 - Nelson
item.description: BC-3A West at BC-6 junction in Nelson. Exit right for BC-3A West/BC-6 North/Trail Castlegar.

item.title: BC-3A West Approaching BC-6
item.description: BC-3A West approaching BC-6 To BC-3/Salmo in Nelson.

item.title: BC-3A - Downtown Nelson
item.description: BC-3A (Ward St.) at Vernon St. in Nelson. Turn right on Vernon St. for BC-3A West/Castlegar and To BC-6/Salmo.

item.title: BC-3A/To BC-6 - Nelson St. Approaching Anderson St. in Nelson
item.description: BC-3A West/To BC-6/Nelson City Centre Next Right on Nelson St. approaching Anderson St. in Nelson.

item.title: End BC-31 South at BC-3A
item.description: End BC-31 South at BC-3A in Balfour. Turn left for BC-3A East to Creston via Kootenay Lake (Ferry). Continue straight for BC-3A West to Nelson.

item.title: End BC-31 South at BC-3A - Balfour
item.description: End BC-31 South at BC-3A in Balfour,

item.title: BC-3A West at BC-31
item.description: BC-3A West at BC-31 in Balfour, leaving the Kootenay Lake Ferry. Turn right for BC-31 north to Ainsworth and Kaslo. Turn left for BC-3A west to Nelson.

item.title: BC-3A West - Kootenay Lake Ferry
item.description: BC-3A West approaching Kootenay Lake Ferry. Use left lane for Pilot Bay Road; right lane for Scott Road. Continue in middle lane for the Kootenay Lake Ferry.

item.title: BC-3 East at BC-3A - Creston
item.description: BC-3 East at BC-3A in Creston. Turn right to continue east on BC-3.

item.title: BC-3 East at BC-3A North
item.description: BC-3 East at BC-3A North in Creston. Turn left for BC-3A North to Kootenay Lake Ferry; turn right for BC-3 East to Creston and Cranbrook. BC-3A is an alternate route to BC-3 and follows Kootenay Lake and the Kootenay River west before re-joining BC-3 in Castlegar.

item.title: End BC-21 North at BC-3 (To BC-3A)
item.description: End BC-21 North at BC-3 (To BC-3A) in Creston. Turn left for BC-3 West to Salmo and Castlegar. Turn right for (BC-3 East), BC-3A North/Kootenay Lake Ferry.

item.title: BC-3 East at BC-3A Junction
item.description: BC-3 East at BC-3A Junction in Keremeos.

item.title: BC-3 East at BC-3A in Keremeos
item.description: BC-3 East at BC-3A in Keremeos

item.title: BC-3 East Approaching BC-3A
item.description: BC-3 East approaching BC-3A in Keremeos.

item.title: BC-3A - Downtown Nelson
item.description: BC-3A/To BC-6/Salmo/Castlegar Overhead
